content.description: The rate of consumption of cola in the United States is given by S(t)=Cekt , where S is measured in billions of gallons per year and t is measured in years from the beginning of 1980.
content.question: Find the average rate of consumption of cola over the 10-year time period beginning January 1, 1983. Indicate units of measure.

frqParts.text: Find the average rate of consumption of cola over the 10-year time period beginning January 1, 1983. Indicate units of measure.

topic.text: 8.1: Finding the Average Value of a Function on an Interval

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
